name: A Night Out (melanuit)
description:
A Night Out is an experimental horror one button game created in the school setting of my first year of Game Design at Isart Digital.

The whole game is played with one button, the "A" button on the xbox controller.

We first had 2 weeks to make a prototype then 1 month to make the full game from scratch all alone.

You embody an orb trying to help a little girl escape from a nightmare. You must detect the enemys and do the appropriate action.

- If you see a Crawler coming, light up and he will flee.

- If you hear a Barbling coming, stop walking for a moment and he will walk away.

- If you feel you controller vibrate, start running to escape him.

You must play with a xbox controller and headphones.

Enjoy !
